text: Vladimir Putin secrets can be found

kolesnikova says some of the cash was

hundred and forty million dollars of

hi Mitra I'm Richard yes nice to meet

this yacht was maintained and paid for

as speculation and rumors

President Putin denies all the

Richard Wilson BBC News
